channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
My client don't work, actually 4 of them i got. When I start the client (while my server is on) it don't connect, and recieves the error: 'error_game_js5connect', I know my cache is in C:\, i also made sure in SignLink.java, and even put it in the client in case it was IP-Changer client. Nothing works. I even made sure I was using a 508 serv, client, and cache, still nothing. I tried 3 diff servers, and nothing. Also, the servers never said there was an incomming connection.
Plz help.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @zinkkyz zinkkyz
item.description:
@zinkkyz wrote:

u using a source???u nid to use a source so u can connect to ur server

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

Unknown Supreme:

Have you hosted a server before? You may not have port-forwarded correctly.

I have port forwarded, i’m experienced with java for 2 years. It’s just i have tried everything i know, and nothing still works.

Read full topic
